metadata.title: CVE-2021-41801 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The ReplaceText extension through 1.41 for MediaWiki has Incorrect AccessControl. When a user is blocked after submitting a replace job, the job isstill run, even if it may be run at a later time (due to the job queuebacklog)

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
